author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lodo Therapeutics - Has Formed A Strategic Drug Discovery Collaboration With Genentech
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Roche Holding AG:
* LODO THERAPEUTICS - HAS FORMED A STRATEGIC DRUG DISCOVERY COLLABORATION WITH GENENTECH, A MEMBER OF ROCHE GROUP
* LODO THERAPEUTICS - UNDER AGREEMENT, GENENTECH WILL UTILIZE COâ€™S PROPRIETARY GENOME MINING AND BIOSYNTHETIC CLUSTER ASSEMBLY PLATFORM
* LODO THERAPEUTICS - WILL RECEIVE UNDISCLOSED UPFRONT PAYMENT, ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE MILESTONE PAYMENTS UP TO $969 MILLION FROM DEAL
* LODO THERAPEUTICS - IS ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE TIERED-ROYALTIES ON SALES OF CERTAIN PRODUCTS RESULTING FROM COLLABORATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
